Secure forward graveyards (Snowfall, Iceblood) for faster respawns

Assign 2-3 bots to defend each initial tower
Group up to contest enemy tower captures

offense: Capture enemy towers in coordinated pushes
Target enemy captain for major reinforcement loss
Push as a group of 5-8 and clear bunkers/towers before attacking the general

defense: Delay enemies to allow your side to kill more commanders

Focus on eliminating remaining enemy players

movement.tanks: Hold chokepoints and pull hostile NPCs to allies
